00018 vector<Post*> Twitter::BasicSearch(BasicQuery* q)
00019 {
00020         vector<Post*> p;
00021         cout<<"Twitter basic search"<<endl;
00022         
00023         char sys_call[1024] = {0};
00024         sprintf(sys_call, "python ./Twitter/Twitter_Query.py query -r %s", q->GetKeyword().c_str());
00025         system( sys_call );     
00026 
00027         Json::Value root;
00028         ifstream fin("POST.json");
00029         fin >> root;
00030         fin.close();
00031 
00032         int index = root.size();
00033         Post* pre = NULL;
00034 
00035         for(int i=0; i< index; ++i){
00036                 Message *_p = new Message();
00037                 _p->SetMessage(root[i]);
00038         
00039                 Post* p_cur = new TwitterTweetDecorator( new TwitterReplyDecorator (_p)) ;
00040                 if(pre != NULL){
00041                         p_cur->SetPrevPost( pre );
00042                         pre->SetNextPost(p_cur);
00043                 }               
00044         
00045                 p.push_back( p_cur  );
00046                 pre = p_cur;
00047         }
00048         
00049         return p;
00050 }

00052 vector<Post*> Twitter::AdvancedSearch(AdvancedQuery* q)
00053 {
00054         vector<Post*> p;
00055         cout<<"Twitter advanced search"<<endl;
00056         
00057         char sys_call[1024] = {0};
00058         char add_opt[1024] = {0};
00059         string keyword = q->GetKeyword();
00060         string person = q->GetPerson();
00061 
00062         if(keyword.compare("*") != 0)
00063                 sprintf(add_opt, "-r %s", keyword.c_str());
00064         if(person.compare("*") != 0)
00065                 sprintf(add_opt, "%s -u %s", add_opt, person.c_str());
00066 
00067         sprintf(sys_call, "python ./Twitter/Twitter_Query.py query %s", add_opt);
00068         system(sys_call);       
00069 
00070         Json::Value root;
00071         ifstream fin("POST.json");
00072         fin >> root;
00073         fin.close();
00074 
00075         int index = root.size();
00076         Post* pre = NULL;
00077 
00078         for(int i=0; i< index; ++i){
00079                 Message *_p = new Message();
00080                 _p->SetMessage(root[i]);
00081         
00082                 Post* p_cur =  new TwitterTweetDecorator( new TwitterReplyDecorator (_p)) ;
00083                 if(pre != NULL){
00084                         p_cur->SetPrevPost( pre );
00085                         pre->SetNextPost(p_cur);
00086                 }
